relevant_rule: Section 91 of the Public Service Staff Relations Act
Section 11 of the Financial Administration Act
application_details: applicant argued he was outside the Public Service as a student and thus eligible for salary negotiation
decision_reasoning: conflicting Treasury Board policies define 'employee' inconsistently
Court declined jurisdiction due to the availability of an adequate grievance process
procedure_followed: judicial review application filed by the applicant after being denied salary negotiation
result_of_case: grievance process must be pursued first
